snippet: For years, Las Vegas took the bigger-is-better route, building expansive glassy megaresorts with 4,000 rooms apiece and seemingly endless check-in counters....

headline.print_headline: After Years of Going Big, Vegas Hotels Go Boutique
headline.main: After Years of Going Big, Vegas Hotels Go Boutique

lead_paragraph: For years, Las Vegas took the bigger-is-better route, building expansive glassy megaresorts with 4,000 rooms apiece and seemingly endless check-in counters.
